Articles.Content:
it would be fun if i could add my very own logo\'s to my rockets, i just don\'t know how to do it.

i dug a little in different threads and didn\'t find anything.

thanks in advance !
Current emblems / roundels are part of a part\'s texture. Given the Decal category on the VAB such things at some point should become placeable.
Which is to say, in the meantime get into <KSP>/Parts/<partname>/textures and hack up your PNGs. Welcome to the world of UV mapping.

Which is to say, in the meantime get into <KSP>/Parts/<partname>/textures and hack up your PNGs. Welcome to the world of UV mapping.

No, that\'s not UV mapping. That\'s texturing. UV mapping is setting up the model so it can be textured.

Which is to say, in the meantime get into <KSP>/Parts/<partname>/textures and hack up your PNGs. Welcome to the world of UV mapping.

Its texturing
